title: Anyone seen or receive these T212s?
author: itjclarke

posts.post_title: Anyone seen or receive these T212s?
posts.post_content: I made a deal for these two cards with a board member after his eBay auction ended unsold.  Apparently it looks like they got mixed up with another card or cards he was sending out.  I trust the seller and his explanation that this was probably a simple mix up, and he has refunded my money, so I'm out nothing.  I just wanted to post them here in case anyone happens see them up for sale, or may have even received them.  Thanks

Ian that sucks!
Hope ya get em back!

Thanks Jay.  No leads yet.  I'll be curious to see if they ever do pop up for sale.  Like said, I'm out no money here, but would have still hoped whoever received these would come forward.  Oh well, I snagged another Powell from Belltown (thanks Scott), so now just need to find me a Zamlock.
